question: This bank waive 12 EMIs on regular home loan repayment under the new scheme Shubh Aarambh Home Loans.
explanation: The affordable housing finance sector, private lender Axis Bank will waive 12 equated monthly installments (EMIs) on regular repayments of loans of up to Rs. 30 lakh under the new scheme Shubh Aarambh Home Loans. The lender has introduced Shubh Aarambh Home Loans, in which 12 EMIs are waived - four EMIs each after the fourth, eighth and 12th year - from the date of the first disbursement. The waiver will be in the form of reduction in tenure.
